articles.description: Reaction as Manchester United edge past Coventry in memorable FA Cup semi-final, while Liverpool return to winning ways at the top of the Premier League, plus all the latest football news.
articles.title: Reaction as Man Utd squeeze into FA Cup final and Liverpool go second in PL

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from day four of the third round in the 2024 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Score, commentary & updates from day four of the third round

articles.description: Jude Bellingham scores late as Real Madrid beat Barcelona to move 11 points clear at the top of La Liga after an enthralling El Clasico.
articles.title: Bellingham strikes late as Real win El Clasico

articles.description: Nottingham Forest did not ask for Stuart Attwell to be taken off video assistant referee duties for their match against Everton, BBC Sport has been told.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest did not ask for VAR official to be changed

articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag admits his side "got away with it" to reach the FA Cup final after their shootout victory against Coventry.
articles.title: 'We got away with it' - 'embarrassment' could 'cost Ten Hag job'

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit and former Liverpool midfielder Danny Murphy says the Reds' refreshed midfield was the key to Sunday's win over Fulham.
articles.title: How clever Klopp’s changes kept Liverpool in title fight

articles.description: Shaun Murphy moves into the last 16 of the World Championship with an impressive performance to beat China's Lyu Haotian 10-5.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2024: Shaun Murphy into last 16

articles.description: Coventry's epic FA Cup semi-final with Manchester United, when the Sky Blues came from 3-0 down to force penalties, will be talked about "forever".
articles.title: ‘They will talk about this forever’ – Coventry close to ‘greatest story'

articles.description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe says fans "have to be a bit patient" following his investment in the club.
articles.title: Manchester United fans have to be patient - Sir Jim Ratcliffe

articles.description: With tennis chiefs engaged in talks about the sport's future, BBC tennis correspondent Russell Fuller assesses what may lie in store.
articles.title: Tennis: ATP, WTA & Grand Slams and in Premium Tour talks but what role will Saudi Arabia play?
